Post_body: Inzaghi at today‚Äôs press conference: "Nico Paz has quality, he has everything. He will have a great career. I don't know him but I've heard good things about him, even on a human level. He has quality and he's physically good too"

Commenti.Body: This is Inzaghi‚Äôs equivalent of ‚Äúplease, PLEASE, PLEAAASE!‚Äù
